name: Snowboarder Multiplayer
description:
An early working prototype of a multiplayer 2D racing snowboarder game.  Featuring weather effects and procedurally generated tracks.  The objective is simple, invite your friends and compete to reach the finish line first.

The controls are WASD to flip, boost and slow down.  You may use a controller along with the mouse buttons for boosting and slowing down.  Completing a flip will temporarily give you an faster speed boost upon landing.
